description: mastoart.social is a creative space for you to share your art and be part of a friendly creative community. A Mastodon instance that's hosted in Germany and runs on 100% green energy.
rules: [{"id": "1", "text": "Be kind and respectful.", "hint": "No personal attacks, harrassment, dogpiling or stalking. Misinformation as well as racist, extremist, ableist, anti-semitic, homophobic, sexist, transphobic or otherwise hateful or discriminatory content are prohibited."}, {"id": "2", "text": "This server is for humans, not for corporations or bots.", "hint": "No corporate content marketing or ads. Promotion of your own work, commissions or stores is welcome and encouraged. Bots are only allowed if given explicit written permission by the administration team."}, {"id": "3", "text": "Content must be your own.", "hint": "You may only upload content that you have created yourself, or content created by third parties that you have explicit permission to upload."}, {"id": "4", "text": "No AI-generated work.", "hint": "You may not upload work generated through, or assisted by, LLMs/AI such as ChatGPT or MidJourney. You are free to upload generative work that does not rely on training from existing work of other people, such as fractals or other types of procedural generation."}, {"id": "5", "text": "No NFTs or cryptocurrencies.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "No erotic or nude photography and no pornography.", "hint": "Drawn or painted non-explicit suggestive and mature content depicting consenting adult characters is welcome, but must be marked as sensitive or put under a content warning (CW) and tagged accordingly. Examples include non-sexual, drawn or painted depictions of nude characters, characters in seductive poses or clothing, or characters engaging in intimate behavior such as ‘making out’."}, {"id": "7", "text": "NSFW and potentially triggering content must be put under a content warning.", "hint": "NSFW (not-safe-for work) content and content including common phobia or anxiety triggers must be marked as sensitive or put under a content warning (CW) and tagged accordingly for ease of filtering. Examples include spiders, gore, drugs, suicidal ideation or erotic content."}, {"id": "9", "text": "No bulk-uploading or flooding the local timeline.", "hint": "This is a microblogging platform, not a gallery site. It runs on voluntary community donations and storage space is not unlimited. Uploading large quantities of images in quick succession floods the local timeline, drowning out other members' works. Please be fair to your fellow creatives."}, {"id": "10", "text": "(Recommended) Add alt text to your images.", "hint": "This is not an enforcable rule, but we recommend that you add alt text to your images if you can. It contributes to an inclusive community and increases the chances that your work will be shared by other users. "}]

description:
2017년부터 마스토돈 개발에 꾸준히 기여하는 원조 장인이 운영하는, 한국어권에서 가장 오래된 마스토돈 서버입니다.
성소수자들이 마음 놓고 이용할 수 있는 공간을 목적으로 개설되었습니다.
rules: [{"id": "1", "text": "인종차별 / 성차별 / 퀴어포비즘 발언 등의 혐오성 발언 금지", "hint": ""}, {"id": "2", "text": "동의 없는 개인정보 공개, 공개적 비방, 비밀글을 작성자에게 해를 끼치기 위해 캡처하여 공개 등 금지", "hint": "공개글로 연합 타임라인에 남들이 다 볼 수 있도록 싸움을 하는 것을 포함합니다"}, {"id": "3", "text": "스팸성으로 다른 사람의 글에 무차별적으로 반응해 괴롭히는 행위 금지", "hint": "다른 사람의 글에 무차별적으로 부스트/좋아요 등의 반응을 보내 관심을 유도하거나 괴롭히는 스팸성 행위를 금지합니다.\r\n- 아무런 상호작용도 없던 봇이 먼저 팔로우/좋아요를 하는 경우 포함"}, {"id": "4", "text": "남을 집요하게 괴롭히는 행위 금지", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "공익을 해하는 허위정보 유포 금지", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "명백한 자살/자해를 예고하는 등의 내용 게시 금지", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "고의로 서버에 부담을 주는 등의 이용목적을 해치는 행위 금지", "hint": "모더레이션 회피를 위해 다른 서버에 계정을 재생성하는 행위 포함."}, {"id": "8", "text": "노출이 심한 사진, 남이 보기에 무섭거나 꺼림칙할 수 있는 사진 등은 NSFW를 걸어 미리보기가 뜨지 않도록 해주세요.\r\n또한, 전체공개글을 이용해 성행위 대상을 모집하지 마세요.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "한국어를 반드시 읽고 쓸 줄 알아야 하며, 다른 사람을 팔로우 하기 전에 최소 한 개 이상의 한국어 게시물이나 한국어가 포함된 자기소개가 존재해야 합니다.", "hint": "이 규칙을 어기는 것으로 판단되면 계정이 정지될 수 있습니다. 하지만 이의제기를 통해 한국어로 소통이 가능하다는 것을 증명하여 무효화 할 수 있습니다."}, {"id": "10", "text": "저작자의 동의 없이 타 사이트의 게시물 등을 무단 재전재하는 소프트웨어 금지", "hint": ""}]
title: 큐돈

rules: [{"id": "4", "text": "NO NON EUROPEAN LANGUAGE:  NO THAI letters, NO CHINESE, NO RUSSIAN etc.\r\nSei immer freundlich und höflich. Behandle andere mit Respekt. Grundsätzlich gilt, dass Verstöße gegen das deutsche und EU-Recht auch hier nicht erlaubt sind. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "Belästige und beleidige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe.Weder allein noch als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen (\"doxing\") wird als Belästigung ausgelegt.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "Die Nutzung oder Befürwortung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher und anderweitig diskriminierender oder hasserfüllter Sprache wird nicht geduldet", "hint": ""}, {"id": "11", "text": "Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen/Fakenews (inkl. Verschwörungstheorien) sind hier unerwünscht. Dazu gehört auch, sich als eine andere (z.B. prominente) Person auszugeben und in deren Namen zu posten. Das Recht auf freie Meinungsäußerung endet dort, wo Gesetze gebrochen werden. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "13", "text": "Werbung wird ausschließlich als klar ersichtliche Ausnahme toleriert, d.h. nur in dem Spezialfall, dass ein Nutzer hier üblicherweise Beiträge mit nicht werbenden Hauptinhalten veröffentlicht. \r\nIm Sinne aller Nutzer können admin-seitig Ausnahmen mit Sponsoren zur Kostendeckung vereinbart werden.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "15", "text": "Verbreitung, auch teilen, insbesondere von Äußerungen, die faschistischem oder dem sog. \"Qanon\"-Umfeld zuzurechnen sind, führt - ohne Distanzierung davon - unter Berücksichtigung sonstiger Postings des jeweiligen Users ggf. zur sofortigen, unwideruflichen Löschung des verbreitenden Userkontos.  ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "16", "text": "Beiträge, die nicht in lateinischen Buchstaben verfasst sind, werden nur ausnahmsweise geduldet. In jedem Fall werden in größerer Zahl am Stück auftretende Beiträge in anderen Buchstaben ggf. ohne inhaltliche Prüfung gelöscht, da ihre Moderation nicht zumutbar ist. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "17", "text": "Posts in Form von Linklisten, die als Werbung anzusehen sind, werden gelöscht. Accounts, die als erste oder einzige Posts solche Listen enthalten, werden ohne Vorwarnung gesperrt. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "18", "text": "NO ACCOUNTS OF CASINO, BITCOIN, LOTTO or any gambling else, NO ACCOUNTS OF NON-EUROPEAN LANGUAGE (non latin letters) WILL BE APPEROVED !!!! Any Spamming accounts are DELETED IMMEDETELY!!", "hint": ""}, {"id": "19", "text": "All registrations of users using non-european letters will be DELETED immediately", "hint": ""}, {"id": "20", "text": "All registrations of bet- platforms or any other spam platforms (esp. vietnamese, thai, chinese, russian ) will be DELETED immediately", "hint": ""}, {"id": "21", "text": "All obviously only-commercial registrations obviously without any benefit for the community will be DELETED immediately !", "hint": ""}, {"id": "22", "text": "ONLY BERLIN (Germany) related users accepted! Please write a full, MEANINGFUL  sentence in a EUROPEAN language with latin letters about YOUR reseon to chose this Berlin (Germany) related server. Commercial users ONLY from Berlin (Germany) will be accepted. SPAMMING users are deleted IMMEDIATELY ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "23", "text": "ANY Promotion for fashism and its stuff (eg.g. Putin, Trump, Musk, AfD will cause deletion of the promoting account. ", "hint": ""}]

This includes thirst traps even if they do not depict anything explicitly sexual. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "No spam. This includes using completely unrelated hashtags in your posts. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "Do not register trademarked usernames unless you are authorized to use that name (Subject to verification and the moderators make the final call)", "hint": ""}, {"id": "34", "text": "No advertising or link farming accounts. Commercial accounts are acceptable only if they are also used for customer engagement.", "hint": "Mastodon is for conversation, not advertisements.  If the majority of your posts link to products or services elsewhere and you do not participate in conversation, or you have no posts and just have profile headers that link to your business, your account is subject to suspension under this rule. "}]

description: This instance aimed at any and all within the furry fandom, though anyone is welcome! We're friendly towards members of the LGBTQ+ community and aiming to offer a safe space for our users.
rules:
[{"id": "8", "text": "Rule #1 – Illegal Content or Conduct", "hint": "Content or conduct that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.

For the avoidance of doubt, this includes but is not limited to: Instructions on how to commit crimes, encouraging acts of violence or terrorism, child sexual abuse material (CSAM) or depictions thereof, and unauthorized access or exploitation of computer systems."}, {"id": "9", "text": "Rule #2 – Discriminatory Conduct", "hint": "Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform."}, {"id": "10", "text": "Rule #3 – Stalking and Harassment", "hint": "Respect other users of our service and other federated instances. If someone doesn’t want anything to do with you, leave them alone. Attempts to bypass blocks, including creating alternate accounts for that purpose, is prohibited.

“Screenshot dunking”, or the act of taking screenshots of posts to repost and harass without directly replying, is strongly discouraged. If someone is annoying you, harassing you, or a genuine danger to other users, block and report them."}, {"id": "11", "text": "Rule #4 – Misinformation and Deceptive Content", "hint": "Misinformation, scams, Ponzi schemes, and other deceptive tactics have become rampant on other platforms and we don’t want to see a resurgence of it in the Fediverse.

Examples of prohibited content include, but are not limited to, the following: COVID and health misinformation, pro-insurrection (Jan 6th) comments or endorsement, NFTs, “crypto” (blockchain & tokens, NOT cryptography), MLMs / pyramid schemes, flat earth claims."}, {"id": "12", "text": "Rule #5 – Missing Content Warning", "hint": "Content warnings (CW) are REQUIRED for NSFW content, political discussion and debate, religious promotion and debate, and drug mentions. Please review https://pawb.social/post/101 for more information."}, {"id": "13", "text": "Rule #5.2 – Sensitive Content in Content Warning Message", "hint": "Don't put polarizing, graphic, or sensitive content in the content warning (CW) description."}, {"id": "14", "text": "Rule #6 – No Spam or Advertising", "hint": "Spam and advertising is not acceptable, but friendly automated bots are welcome. Where possible, try to restrict any recurring automated posts to Unlisted to avoid cluttering the Local and Federated timeline. Content posted by small businesses is NOT considered advertising for the purposes of this rule."}, {"id": "15", "text": "Rule #7 – Disengage and Report Abuse", "hint": "If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging. We don’t want users to end up getting caught in the crossfire for attempting to correct a user in good faith, as this makes our jobs significantly harder.

Additionally, the team is here to help – If you’re unsure on a particular post, user profile, instance, etc. and don’t think we’ve seen or dealt with it yet, please send in a report. No user will ever be penalized for genuine use of the report system."}, {"id": "16", "text": "Rule #8.1 – Account / Post Language Missing", "hint": "We require that all posts are properly marked with the language used, which can be done at the account level through the account preferences page, or per-post by clicking the language button next to “CW” (Content Warning)."}, {"id": "17", "text": "Rule #8.2 – Account Impersonation", "hint": "You may not impersonate an individual, group, or organization with the intent to deceive, confuse, and exploit other users. Parody accounts should tag themselves clearly in their profile description."}, {"id": "18", "text": "Rule #8.3 – Unmarked Bot Account", "hint": "Bot accounts must mark themselves as a bot and must post using “Unlisted”, “Followers only”, or “Mentioned people only”, so we can keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users."}, {"id": "19", "text": "Rule #8.4 – Unauthorized Brand / Government Accounts", "hint": "No brand or government-affiliated account may be registered on Pawb.Social services without prior written and publicly recorded approval, except furry fandom-operated brands and events covered by the exception in our full rules. This rule ONLY applies to accounts on Pawb.Social services."}, {"id": "20", "text": "Rule #8.5 – Bypassing Suspension", "hint": "If you have been suspended from any Pawb.Social instance, you may not create another account on any of our services."}, {"id": "21", "text": "Rule #8.6 – Prohibited Avatar / Header Image", "hint": "All avatars and header images must not contain any content that is prohibited by any other rule in the Code of Conduct, especially content that requires a Content Warning (CW)."}, {"id": "22", "text": "Full Code of Conduct", "hint": "The full Code of Conduct can be found at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jXkulJKMWEmv-cb_jaYkG2L0sTcZeHKdcqwImNkf6Ko – Some rules and wording listed here have been summarized for brevity."}]

I post within the intersections of veganism, anarchism, technology, collapse, and neurodivergence.

Veganism Social is an activist project that I've hosted since November 2022. You can message me here or by email at admin@veganism.social.

Contributions to my Patreon allow me to expand the scope of my vegan-tech activism.

description: A community for all types of creators, those who consume the creations & everyone else (except for automated/bot accounts, they are highly discouraged).
rules: [{"id": "20", "text": "Be Kind and Respectful. Don't be racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, fatphobic, etc.", "hint": "Any discriminatory, threatening or harassment behaviour or content promoting / advocating said behaviours will not be tolerated."}, {"id": "24", "text": "Keep Your Content LEGAL! ", "hint": "Don't do/discuss doing/link to anything illegal (as determined by UK & EU law)."}, {"id": "36", "text": "Must consider others at all times.", "hint": "Include relevant #HashTags to aid discoverability & filtering potential and add image descriptions (Alt-Text). \r\nUse of a Content Wrapper/Warning (CW) must be utilised for topics and/or images that may invoke a strong difference of opinion or could be distressing to some (for example: phobias), as well as lewd, suggestive or adult themed imagery or text. "}, {"id": "38", "text": "Own your own content.", "hint": "Your posts should be a representative of you (whether thats from your likes, opinions, personality), don't just echo it from elsewhere.\r\nIf you must include other peoples content then please make sure to credit them appropriately whenever possible."}, {"id": "39", "text": "No unsolicited / spam posts permitted.", "hint": "This includes mass mentioning, timeline flooding, constant follow/boost requests, commercial/product advertising or promotional campaigns, etc."}, {"id": "40", "text": "No impersonation of an entity or another individual.", "hint": "Your identity must be your own, whether this is yourself or your online persona. Business/corporate, automated & bot accounts are not permitted to join unless for support purposes only and have explicit authorisation from ourselves."}, {"id": "41", "text": "Do not attempt to disrupt or spoil others' experiences.", "hint": "This includes misusing the reporting, CW or any other systems of the fediverse."}]
title: CR8R

contact:
{"email": "sakurajimamastodon@joinsakurajima.org", "account": {"id": "109322380927047278", "username": "sakurajima", "acct": "sakurajima", "display_name": "Hoshino Aiko (星野愛子・あいたん) 🌸", "locked": false, "bot": false, "discoverable": true, "indexable": true, "group": false, "created_at": "2022-11-11T00:00:00.000Z", "note": "

Mascot Name: Hoshino Aiko (星野愛子) , 愛称：あいたん (Informal Name: Ai-tan)

The official Sakurajima and administrative account for the latest updates regarding this instance. Sakurajima is a Mastodon instance for fans of Japanese media and Anime Bloggers.

This account also follows anime related content, creators, and curated Japanese accounts to make them available at our instance.

If you need assistance, please contact our mod team or this account. See about page.

", "url": "https://sakurajima.moe/@sakurajima", "uri": "https://sakurajima.moe/users/sakurajima", "avatar": "https://media.sakurajima.moe/accounts/avatars/109/322/380/927/047/278/original/7502597e7e3641e6.jpeg", "avatar_static": "https://media.sakurajima.moe/accounts/avatars/109/322/380/927/047/278/original/7502597e7e3641e6.jpeg", "header": "https://media.sakurajima.moe/accounts/headers/109/322/380/927/047/278/original/8856dc6f04b40fc2.jpg", "header_static": "https://media.sakurajima.moe/accounts/headers/109/322/380/927/047/278/original/8856dc6f04b40fc2.jpg", "followers_count": 609, "following_count": 56, "statuses_count": 659, "last_status_at": "2025-03-15", "hide_collections": false, "noindex": true, "emojis": [], "roles": [{"id": "3", "name": "Owner", "color": "#942192"}], "fields": [{"name": "homepage", "value": "https://sakurajima.moe", "verified_at": null}, {"name": "blog", "value": "https://joinsakurajima.org", "verified_at": null}, {"name": "Location", "value": "Maryland, US", "verified_at": null}, {"name": "About our Mascot", "value": "https://joinsakurajima.org/about-our-mascot/", "verified_at": "2024-01-12T15:22:13.621+00:00"}, {"name": "Bluesky", "value": "https://bsky.app/profile/joinsakurajima.org", "verified_at": null}]}}
description: A comfy, non-toxic, and inclusive Anime/Manga/Japanese Media fandom and Japanese Media/Culture Content Creators (Bloggers/Artists/Video Creators/Podcasters/etc.) Mastodon Server
rules: [{"id": "2", "text": "You may not harass/bully people, incite violence, and/or post hate speech (e.g. racism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, etc)", "hint": "This includes other abusive behavior such as cyberbullying, brigading/dogpiling, doxxing, trolling, swatting, sending death threats, abusing #fediblock tag,  etc."}, {"id": "3", "text": "Do not post misinformation anything advocating extremist movements", "hint": "Examples includes Anti-Vaxx, Covid-19 misinformation, 5G conspiracy theories or to extremist movements:  National Socialism, Alt-Right, MAGA,  voicing support for fascist/totalitarian regimes, etc"}, {"id": "4", "text": "Do not post images associated with hate movements, extremist ideologies or groups", "hint": "Examples includes Confederate States, National Socalism symbols, Alt-Right, etc."}, {"id": "5", "text": "NSFW content must be tagged approprately with content warning applied or marked as sensitive. No posting of underaged sexual-explicit content (real life/CSAM/CSEM and lolicon/shotacon) is allowed. This rule is handled differently for servers on the exception list, see about page.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "Properly credit artwork that you didn’t create and AI content must be tagged. No accounts that solely posts AI.", "hint": "Use #AIArt for any artwork that is generated from AI so users can properly filter it. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content."}, {"id": "7", "text": "Do not post SPAM, links to scam sites, pirated materials, phishing sites, or websites that break federal laws.", "hint": "Self promotion is OK, as long the links are safe and does not break the above rules."}, {"id": "8", "text": "By using this service, you are expected to follow the laws of the United States of America. Refrain from posting anything that may break federal laws.\r\n", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "No mini-modding. If you see any post break the rules, report the post instead.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "11", "text": "Sensitive content (e.g. violence, blood/gore, NSFW, self harm) should be put behind a content warning or mark sensitive.", "hint": "Note that demanding and/or berating users for not using CW, except from a moderator is not allowed, See https://forums.sakurajima.moe/resources/content-warning-policy.18/ for more information about content warnings. "}, {"id": "13", "text": "Creator accounts  must be Japanese media/culture related  or inspired. This rule does not apply to non-creators. See about page for full details", "hint": ""}, {"id": "14", "text": "You may operate bots, but they must follow our rules and must be Japanese Media related.", "hint": "Bots should not post more than 4 public posts in an hour or 16 unlisted posts in an hour. No repetitive posts, unless unlisted. Bots cannot use AI chat bots (e.g. ChatGPT)."}, {"id": "15", "text": "No impersonation accounts are allowed (of any creator or famous people) without proper identification. ", "hint": " Parody accounts may not be created here, RP accounts are however allowed."}, {"id": "16", "text": "Not your wank bank. Accounts with zero community interaction without a filled profile  that only follow porn accounts will be banned.", "hint": "If the account only follows porn accounts without a filled out profile (bio+avatar) and/or inital interaction in a 48 hour period after signing up will be suspended."}]

Compte principalement dédié à l'information auprès des utilisateur·ices. En cas de besoin / urgence, contactez les administrateurs et modérateurs (liste ici : https://toot.aquilenet.fr/about)

description: We are a community-driven server operated by a diverse group of foreigners residing in Japan. While we primarily have English speakers in our community, we welcome users of all languages.
rules: [{"id": "11", "text": "Be considerate. No discrimination based on race, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, nationality, or any other characteristic.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "12", "text": "No trolling. Do not engage in non-constructive behavior designed to upset members of the community.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "13", "text": "Sexually explicit content must be behind a CW, and your bio (profile picture, banner etc) must be completely safe.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "14", "text": "No inciting violence or promoting violent ideologies.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "15", "text": "Don’t go overboard with media uploads. Treating Famichiki as free personal file storage is inappropriate and disrespectful to our contributors.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "16", "text": "No big corporate advertising or crypto. However, if you are active in the community and also have a project or small business to share, self-promotion is encouraged.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "17", "text": "Bots are allowed, within reason. Spamming the local timeline with repetitive/nearly-identical content is not permitted: either set your bot posts to ‘unlisted’ or try a more bot focused server instead. Ask us if you’re unsure!", "hint": ""}, {"id": "18", "text": "Don’t post or use this server for illegal content. We are aware of Japan’s questionable laws regarding the protection of minors: ‘illegal’ here also covers all CSEM/CSAM.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "19", "text": "Not your wank bank. Accounts with zero community interaction that only follow porn accounts will be banned. All accounts following CSAM (including art) will also be banned.", "hint": ""}]
title: Famichiki

description: CORTEX IMPLANT - an international cyberpunk'ish LGBTQIA+ friendly Fediverse instance for edgerunners, netrunners and cyberpunks and all who want to become one.
rules:
[{"id": "22", "text": "We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "23", "text": "We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "24", "text": "We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "25", "text": "We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.

description:
Just your average friendly Danish Mastodon server.
New users tooting in Danish/English welcome.
Administered from Denmark. Hosted on bare-metal Kubernetes in the EU.
rules: [{"id": "12", "text": "WRITE IN ACCEPTABLE LANGUAGES ONLY. Acceptable languages here are English or Danish. Swedish and Norwegian is also acceptable. This includes both toots/posts and boosts/reposts. The practical reason for this, is that these are the languages known to all the moderators.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "14", "text": "DANISH LAW APPLIES HERE. Failure to adhere to the law will get you permanently banned.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "16", "text": "NO EXTREMISM. Religious or political extremism is not tolerated here. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "18", "text": "NO DISCRIMINATION. Discrimination of any kind (racism, sexism, xenophobia, homophobia, transphobia etc.) is not tolerated here. Obviously that includes name calling, targeted misgendering, deadnaming or promotion of so-called \"conversation therapy\".\r\n", "hint": ""}, {"id": "20", "text": "FOLLOW THE RULES. Failure to comply with these simple rules will result in either a warning, temporary ban, permanent ban or report to the proper authorities, depending on the case.\r\n", "hint": ""}, {"id": "22", "text": "NO DISINFORMATION. Systematic spreading of disinformation, fake news, conspiracy theories etc. is not tolereated. If you believe COVID vaccinations are a government scheme to help big pharma and boost 5G reception, this server is not for you and we will help you find the exit.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "24", "text": "PRIVATE USERS ONLY. This server is meant for private individuals, and the creation of accounts for associations, companies etc. requires a preexisting agreement with the administration team. Reach out to support@mstdn.dk.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "26", "text": "RESPECT THE VOLUNTEER EFFORT. The servers hosting this instance are sponsored by Incredible Bits ApS. The administration of the instance itself is solely a volunteer effort, and users of the site shouldn't expect the same service level as on a paid service.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "59", "text": "USE CONTENT WARNINGS. Potentially upsetting posts should come with a Content Warning (CW). This includes but is not limited to sex, pornography, mutilation, self injury etc. This also applies when boosting other people's posts.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "91", "text": "DO NOT IMPERSONATE OTHER USERS. Attempts to impersonate other users or staff on this instance will result in immediate suspension. This includes signing up with names that approximate that of another user or changing your display name to that of another user.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "125", "text": "NO SPAM. This server is not meant as an advertisement channel for your company, your crypto currency scam, your YouTube channel or anything along those lines. If you're trying to sell something or lure someone in, you're in the wrong place.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "126", "text": "DON'T BE A DICK. Don't post incoherent sentences. Don't just link elsewhere without context or description. Don't use excessive tagging. Don't be repetitive. Don't be the one that upsets the delicate calm of the admins, for they are subtle and quick to anger.", "hint": ""}]

description: Speak your mind with respect. Boston, MA area, but open to all. Posting size is 12K characters because you have interesting things to say. Cloudflare aggressive AI Bot blocking. Threads federating.
rules: [{"id": "3", "text": "No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, threats, doxing, trolling, or ageism. No attacks on someone's religion, culture, language, or country of origin. Don't be insulting and argumentative.To be here, you must be nice to people.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "No spreading of misinformation. To clarify: Misinformation includes easily disproved beliefs like vaccines cause autism, the earth if flat, birds aren't real, etc. Misinformation is not political beliefs that do not align with yours.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": "Do not spam or create spam accounts ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "No impersonating people or brands. Satire must be clearly labeled", "hint": ""}, {"id": "15", "text": "Do not post Copyrighted materials. We adhere to DMCA take-down notices. See our DMCA policy at the bottom of https://hear-me.social/about. DMCA Registration number:  DMCA-1044123", "hint": ""}, {"id": "16", "text": "No ads without permission. Accounts that appear to be created just to promote products and websites will be suspended. In some cases, we may allow the account to remain, but may limit the account.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "17", "text": "NO CHILD SEXUAL ABUSE POSTINGS (CSAM)! Be aware that we have Cloudflare automatically scan cached images for CSAM violations. They match mathematical image hashes to a database of known CSAM hashes.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "18", "text": "Posting nude photos or controversial pictures and posts without content warnings and appropriate hashtags is not allowed. Also, using inappropriate hashtags to unfairly extend the reach of a post is also not allowed", "hint": ""}, {"id": "19", "text": "Targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called \"conversion therapy\" is prohibited.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "20", "text": "Content created by others must be attributed, and use of AI must be disclosed. Profiles that only post AI-generated content will be suspended", "hint": ""}, {"id": "21", "text": "You must be at least 13-years-old to open an account here", "hint": ""}]
title: hear-me.social -- Say what is on your mind, but with respect

rules: [{"id": "12", "text": "I am at least 16 years of age or older on the date of registration for the disabled.social instance.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "13", "text": "I agree to not discriminate or promote/advocate content that oppresses members of marginalized groups (see rules for examples of groups).", "hint": ""}, {"id": "14", "text": "I agree to not threaten, stalk, or dox people.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "15", "text": "I agree to not harass others using tactics such as brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "16", "text": "I agree to not engage in mobbing, name-calling, intentional misgendering, or deadnaming.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "17", "text": "I agree to not promote/advocate violent nationalist propaganda, fascism, Nazi symbolism, or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "18", "text": "I agree to not promote/advocate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "19", "text": "I agree to not promote/advocate unsubstantiated conspiracy theories related to anti-vaxx and COVID19.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "20", "text": "I agree to alt text images, caption videos, and try my best to follow the best practices for screen readers.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "21", "text": "I agree to not be spammy (e.g., spamming feeds with giveaways, crypto, etc.)", "hint": ""}, {"id": "22", "text": "I agree to not post, promote, or advocate any content that is illegal in the United States.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "23", "text": "I agree to not use disabled.social as a way to grow a commercial business, market products, or as a way to profit off of disabled people. EXCEPTION: Disabled people who sell products as part of mutual aid efforts and survival (e.g., Etsy shops, personal businesses, written works like books, etc.) ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "24", "text": "I agree to use content warnings where appropriate.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "25", "text": "I agree to follow the remainder of the rules and adhere to the best practices outlined on the server about page.", "hint": ""}]

description: 머스타드(Mustard)는 여러분의 일상에 톡 쏘는 즐거움을 더하는 연합 뷔페입니다.
rules: [{"id": "2", "text": "머스타드는 모두가 즐길 수 있는 연합 뷔페입니다.", "hint": "모두가 즐길 수 있게 만드는 곳은 손님 여러분이 만들어가는 것입니다. "}, {"id": "3", "text": "강요하지 마세요.", "hint": "성적, 비윤리적, 폭력적, 정치적 게시글 등 타인에게 불쾌감을 줄 수 있는 이야기 및 컨텐츠를 다른 사람들이 보길 강요하지 말아주세요. 공개글을 올리는 건 강요가 될 수 있으며, CW 사용은 입막음이나 검열이 아닙니다. 몰라서 문제가 아닌 너무 많이 알아서 문제인 지금 세상에서, \"모를 권리\" 및 \"안 들을 권리\"도 존중해주세요. 머스타드는 최대한 많은 사람들이 자유롭게 연합 뷔페를 즐기길 희망합니다."}, {"id": "7", "text": "혐오하지 마세요.", "hint": "머스타드는 인종, 성별, 성적 지향 등에 대한 모든 종류의 차별을 엄격히 금지합니다. 차별적인 언행에 대한 글이 올라올 시 즉시 삭제처리되며, 3번 이상 반복될 시 뷔페에서 추방도 가능합니다."}, {"id": "9", "text": "괴롭히지 마세요.", "hint": "익명으로 다른 손님의 험담을 하는 행위, 머스타드의 규칙에 게재되지 않은 암묵적인 규칙을 만들어 다른 손님에게 강요하는 행위, 다른 손님들에게 무작위로 느닷없이 스팸글을 멘션하는 행위, 다른 손님의 말꼬리를 잡고 의견 답변 피드백을 강요하는 행위 등 괴롭힘 범주에 들어가는 행위를 우리 뷔페에선 엄중히 처벌하고 있으며, 악질적인 경우엔 뷔페에서 추방 및 출입금지하고 있습니다."}, {"id": "10", "text": "준법 정신을 지키세요.", "hint": "머스타드는 대한민국을 거점으로 하는 뷔페이기 때문에, 대한민국의 법률을 지킵니다. 도박이나 성적인 컨텐츠 등 불법적인 컨텐츠의 적발에 대해서는 머스타드에서 책임지지 않습니다. 이런 행위에 대해서 적발될 시 즉시 뷔페에서 추방하고 있습니다."}, {"id": "11", "text": "뮤트는 배려입니다.", "hint": "2번에서 언급한 민감한 컨텐츠를 게시할 때는, CW로 가려주시고 어떤 주제에 관한 내용인지 제목에 서치방지 없이 써주세요. 그리고 머스타드에선 민감한 컨텐츠 자체를 검열하지 않으니, 이런 컨텐츠를 보고 싶지 않으시다면 유저 및 단어 뮤트, 또는 블락 기능을 적극 사용해주세요."}]
title: 머스타드

(PL): Mastodon Polska - Bezpieczna, wolna instancja otwartej sieci społecznościowej Mastodon.
(EN): Mastodon Poland - A safe, free instance of the Mastodon open social network.
rules:
[{"id": "1", "text": "(EN): No threats, harassment, racism, homophobia, sexism, and incitement to hatred towards individuals or groups. (PL): Niedozwolone są groźby, znęcanie się, rasizm, homofobia, seksizm oraz nawoływanie do nienawiści wobec jednostek oraz grup.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "2", "text": "(EN): No illegal content e.g. child pornography, pornography, frauds, illegal services etc.
(PL): Niedozwolony jest content zabroniony prawnie np. dziecięca pornografia, pornografia, oszustwa, nielegalne usługi itp.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "(EN): No posting malicious links.
(PL): Niedozwolone jest publikowanie złośliwych linków.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "(EN): No hate speech.
(PL): Niedozwolona jest mowa nienawiści.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "(EN): NSFW content should be marked with a Content Warning. 
(PL): Treść NSFW piowinna być oznaczona ostrzeżeniem o zawartości.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "(EN): No spamming or explicit advertising allowed without proper introduction and/or other activity.
(PL): Niedozwolone generowanie spamu ani jawnej reklamy bez odpowiedniego wprowadzenia i/lub innej aktywności.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "(EN): Comments should be related to the topics appearing within the thematic threads. (PL): Wypowiedzi powinny być związane z treściami pojawiającymi się w ramach wątków tematycznych.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": "(EN): No insults based on their gender, sexual orientation, nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, or lack thereof. (PL): Niedozwolone jest znieważanie Użytkowników z powodu ich przynależności płciowej, seksualnej, narodowej, etnicznej, rasowej, wyznaniowej, albo z powodu jej bezwyznaniowości.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "(EN): No chauvinistic, misogynistic nature, as well as content displaying signs of gender discrimination. (PL): Niedozwolone są treści o charakterze szowinistycznym i mizoginistycznym, jak również noszące znamiona dyskryminacji płciowej.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "(EN): No content violating the personal rights of any third party. (PL): Zabrania się zamieszczania treści naruszających dobra osobiste osób trzecich.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "11", "text": "(EN): No content inciting dangerous behavior or praising such behaviord. (PL): Niedozwolone są treści nawołujące do zachowań niebezpiecznych, lub pochwalają takie zachowania.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "12", "text": "(EN): Upon creating an account, it is required to introduce oneself using the hashtag #introduction in one's post. (PL): Po utworzeniu konta, wymagane jest przedstawienie się z wykorzystaniem hasztagu #introduction w swoim toot'cie.", "hint": ""}]
title: Mastodon Poland

rules: [{"id": "1", "text": "Наш сервер беларускамоўны, таму дазваляюцца выключна беларускамоўныя ўліковыя запісы і допісы. Выкарыстўваць можна як кірыліцу так і лацінку. У любых іншых выпадках уліковы запіс можа быць заблакаваны мадэратармі серверу.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "Дазваляецца выкарыстанне міжнароднай ангельскай мовы ў допісах. Дазваляецца выкарыстанне іншых моў у апісанні ўліковага запісў, але наяўнасть беларускай часткі апісання абавязковая.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "Дазваляецца пашыраць іншамоўныя допісы, калі гэта не парушае іншыя правілы нашай суполкі. Дазваляецца адказваць на іншамоўныя допісы на мове допісў, калі гэта не парушае іншыя правілы нашай суполкі.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": "Забаронены пагрозы асабістай бяспецы карыстальнікаў серверу ў любым выглядзе. Пагрозы расправамі, шатнатж, правакацыі, агрэсіўныя дзеянні, публікацыя асабістых дадзеных карыстальнікаў без іх дазволу і іншае можа быць падставай для блакавання ўліковага запісу мадэратармі серверу.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "Паважаем, дапамагаем ды не абражаем адно аднаго. Абразы могуць прывесці да папярэджвання ці блакавання ўліковага запісу.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "Забаронена парнаграфія, прапагадай расізму, імперыялізму, нацызму, фашызму, камунізму, гамафобія і іншыя супярэчлівыя тэмы. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "11", "text": "Забаронена як рэлігіёзная прапаганда, так і абразы рэлігіёзных поглядаў.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "12", "text": "Абмежаванні і блакаванні іншых сервераў з сеціва Мастадон адбываецца па вырашэнні мадэратараў серверу на падставе скаргаў ад карыстальнікаў серверу.", "hint": ""}]

{"email": "help@masto.nyc", "account": {"id": "109314503332733704", "username": "seano", "acct": "seano", "display_name": "Hi I'm Sean", "locked": false, "bot": false, "discoverable": true, "indexable": true, "group": false, "created_at": "2022-11-09T00:00:00.000Z", "note": "

description: Der Mastodon Fediverse Server für Österreich.
rules:
[{"id": "5", "text": "Nichts Diskriminierendes:

Jegliche Form von Diskriminierung ist verboten. Das inkludiert, ist aber nicht beschränkt auf: Ableismus, Antisemitismus, Homofeindlichkeit, Islamophobie, Klassismus, Rassismus, Sexismus, Transfeindlichkeit, etc. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "Nichts Ungesetzliches:

Poste nichts ungesetzliches (österreichisches Recht / EU Recht).", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "Nichts Belästigendes:

Kein Spam, Trolling, Bullying, oder ähnliche Belästigungen.
Keine Aufrufe zu Hass oder Gewalt.
Keine Pornographie.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": "Nichts Automatisiertes:

Keine Bots, kein Crossposting (z.B. spiegeln von Twitter posts etc.)", "hint": ""}, {"id": "11", "text": "Nichts (absichtlich) Fälschliches:

Keine Fake-news, Falschinformationen, Wissenschaftsleugnung.
Keine Verbreitung von Gerüchten oder Propaganda.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "12", "text": "Hinweis für Unternehmenskonten:

Unternehmenskonten, unternehmensähnliche Konten und/oder Geschäftskonten, sind nur mit Einschränkungen erlaubt. Inoffizielle Unternehmenskonten werden gesperrt.

Bezüglich Unternehmenskonten wendet euch daher bitte vorab an: support@fediverse.foundation", "hint": ""}, {"id": "13", "text": "English translation:

For our English speaking users we have prepared the the essential documents in our wiki. Please take a look here:
https://wiki.apps.fedi.at/books/fediverse-foundation-announcements", "hint": ""}]
title: Mastodon Instanz für Österreich

Prosím zachovejte zde slušnost. Vulgární a urážlivé příspěvky budou správci skupiny bez upozornění smazány.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "Respektujte druhé. Netolerujeme žádné posměšné, urážlivé nebo nenávistné komentáře týkající se rasy, náboženství, kultury, sexuální orientace, pohlaví, identity, ani politické příslušnosti a dalších věcí. Respektujte odlišnost názorů i životních postojů druhých.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "Žádné obtěžování, dogpiling nebo doxxing ostatních uživatelů ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "11", "text": "Nesdílejte záměrně nepravdivé nebo zavádějící informace ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "12", "text": "Žádný obsah nelegální v České republice nebo EU", "hint": ""}, {"id": "13", "text": "Žádnou pornografii  No pornography", "hint": ""}, {"id": "15", "text": "Žádné účty, které se vydávají za někoho jiného, ​​pokud nejsou jako takové jasně označeny za účelem parodie. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "16", "text": "Žádný vizuální obsah zobrazující popravy, vraždy, sebevraždy, rozřezání, viditelné vnitřnosti, nadměrné krveprolití nebo ohořelá těla. Všechny ostatní násilné snímky vyžadují upozornění na obsah.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "17", "text": "Je zakázáno rozesílání spamu a nevyžádaných komerčních nabídek.", "hint": ""}]

description: Die Social Media Plattform für Tirol und allen Menschen, die sich in den Alpen wohlfühlen.
rules: [{"id": "50", "text": "Respektiere deine Mitmenschen", "hint": "Behandle andere Menschen so, wie du auch behandelt werden möchtest! Nutze deinen Hausverstand."}, {"id": "51", "text": "Eigene Verantwortung für Privatsphäre", "hint": "Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht."}, {"id": "52", "text": "Klare Kommunikation", "hint": "Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Beachte, dass Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen werden und Missverständnisse fördern."}, {"id": "53", "text": "Keine Beleidigungen oder respektlose Äußerungen", "hint": "Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut, aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen."}, {"id": "54", "text": "Keine Diskriminierung oder Hassrede", "hint": "Diskriminierung jeglicher Art – ob rassistisch, sexistisch, frauenfeindlich, homophob, antisemitisch oder anderweitig menschenfeindlich – ist strengstens verboten."}, {"id": "55", "text": "Keine Belästigung oder ungewollte Kontaktaufnahme", "hint": "Belästigungen und unerwünschte Kontaktaufnahmen (einschließlich Brigading und Dogpiling) sind untersagt. Respektiere die Wünsche anderer Benutzer, keinen Kontakt zu wollen."}, {"id": "56", "text": "Kein Antisemitismus oder nationalistische Gewaltpropaganda", "hint": "Gewalttätige, nationalistische Inhalte, Nazi-Symbolik und die Förderung von nationalsozialistischer Ideologie sind verboten."}, {"id": "57", "text": "Keine Straftaten oder Verstöße gegen geltendes Recht", "hint": "Halte dich an die Gesetze. Auch Online-Handlungen können strafrechtliche Konsequenzen haben."}, {"id": "58", "text": "Keine illegalen Inhalte", "hint": "Inhalte, die in Europa verboten sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen. Je nach Inhalt sehen wir uns im Recht den Benutzernamen, die E-Mail-Adresse und die IP-Adresse an die Behörden weiterzuleiten."}, {"id": "59", "text": "Keine Verschwörungstheorien", "hint": "Verschwörungstheorien, die diskriminierendes oder schädliches Verhalten unterstützen, sind hier nicht erlaubt."}, {"id": "60", "text": "Not Safe For Work (NSFW) Inhalte", "hint": "Überlege dir genau, ob diese Plattform der richtige Ort für einen NSFW-Only-Account ist. Möglicherweise gibt es dafür passendere Alternativen. Falls du dich für NSFW-Only-Inhalte entscheidest, dann müssen die Beiträge mindestens als \"Öffentlich (still)\" veröffentlicht werden (sie sind sichtbar, erscheinen jedoch nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Zudem ist es Pflicht, den Beitrag mit einer Inhaltswarnung zu versehen."}, {"id": "61", "text": "Automatisierte Beiträge (Bots)", "hint": "Automatisierte Inhalte sollten als \"Öffentlich (still)\" veröffentlicht werden (sie sind sichtbar, erscheinen jedoch nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Diese Regel gilt auch für Bots, Feed-Poster und Crossposts. Konten, die nur Crossposten und sich nicht aktiv beteiligen, können entfernt werden."}]

rules: [{"id": "1", "text": "Sont interdits les propos, images ou vidéos racistes, sexistes, homophobes ou transphobes. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "2", "text": "Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "Les contenus reconnus comme potentiellement choquants pour tout public, pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau \"sensible / sensitive\". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "Conformément aux lois belges, européennes et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": "Il est interdit publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper; la satire comme le gorafi ou the onion sont autorisés. Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués dans leur nom et description publique.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ». ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "11", "text": "Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "12", "text": "il est interdit de mégenrer et/ou morinomer volontairement quelqu'un, de promouvoir les \"thérapies de genre\"", "hint": ""}]

description: Foro que privilegia el diálogo informado y respetuoso; un entorno apropiado para expresarte sin ser censurado por tu ideología o tus creencias. Temáticas: Política, Ciencia y Cultura. 850 caracteres.
rules: [{"id": "17", "text": "Todo miembro de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org acepta de manera voluntaria los Términos del servicio."}, {"id": "33", "text": "Todo miembro de esta instancia se obliga voluntariamente a respetar cada uno de los puntos del código de conducta. De no hacerlo, recibirá hasta un máximo de tres llamadas de atención, dependiendo de la severidad de la falta. En caso de reincidencia, su cuenta será cancelada."}, {"id": "34", "text": "Todo miembro de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org se compromete a respetar las indicaciones, sugerencias o peticiones directas que le realice el equipo de administración. No hacerlo es causa de suspensión de la cuenta."}, {"id": "35", "text": "El equipo de administración de social.politicaconciencia.org está obligado a resolver los problemas que surjan de la interacción entre los miembros de la instancia."}, {"id": "36", "text": "Se permite la expresión libre de las ideas sin importar las creencias, las convicciones políticas o religiosas de los miembros de la instancia, siempre y cuando no contradigan algún punto del código de conducta."}, {"id": "37", "text": "No está permitido el uso de palabras altisonantes, frases, albures, composiciones lingüísticas, etc., empleadas con el propósito claro de ofender, denigrar, humillar o difamar a cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso."}, {"id": "38", "text": "Está prohibido el uso de imágenes o material multimedia (audio, video, gifs animados, etc.,) destinados a ofender, denigrar, humillar o difamar a cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso."}, {"id": "39", "text": "Se prohíbe cualquier forma de discriminación, ya sea por género, condición económica, nacionalidad, condición de salud o similares, en contra de cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso."}, {"id": "40", "text": "Cuando un miembro de la instancia desconozca un tema, queda prohibido responder en términos que lo disuadan de manifestar sus dudas. Siempre que le sea posible,  cada usuario debe ayudar a disipar los vacíos de conocimiento. Nadie puede ser discriminado por su nivel de conocimiento."}, {"id": "41", "text": "Durante el proceso para dirimir una controversia, no se considerará como razón válida en su defensa el que un usuario alegue que desconoce los términos del servicio o el código de conducta para justificar la realización de acciones que vayan en su contra. Es deber de todos los usuarios conocerlos."}, {"id": "42", "text": "Para la buena convivencia, los debates  deben favorecer la exposición de los argumentos y no centrarse en ataques contra el objeto o tema del que se hable, ni en contra de la persona que lo expone. Con ello se busca procurar conversaciones constructivas con contenido informativo enriquecedor."}, {"id": "43", "text": "Se prohíbe subir, compartir o divulgar material pornográfico de cualquier índole, incluida la pedofilia. Infringir este punto es causa de revocación inmediata de la cuenta de usuario."}, {"id": "44", "text": "El material artístico con contenido sexual explícito está permitido; no obstante, debe ser marcado como material sensible (CW). De lo contrario, podría ser eliminado."}, {"id": "45", "text": "El material audiovisual (imágenes, audio, video, gifs, etc.,) cuyo contenido sea definible como violento, necesariamente debe ser marcado como material sensible (CW). De otra forma, podrá ser eliminado."}, {"id": "46", "text": "Esta instancia no puede ser usada para la realización de actividades consideradas como delictivas por la legislación vigente en México."}, {"id": "47", "text": "Casos no previstos aquí serán resueltos por los administradores de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org"}]
title: Red social de Política ConCiencia

rules: [{"id": "2", "text": "Be nice and have fun! Use content warnings (CW) and #hashtags liberally.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "No hate speech. Do not use pejorative or discriminatory language with reference to a person or a group on the basis of who they are, in other words, based on their religion, ethnicity, nationality, race, colour, descent, gender, sexual orientation or other identity factor.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "Criticize ideas, not people. Do not \"shitpost\" or post in bad faith, engage in name calling, or ad hominem attacks.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "Do not harass anyone, or post other people’s personally identifying information (\"doxing\").", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": "Do not post illegal, illicit, or unlicensed content.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "Manual Review", "hint": "In the last box on the signup page please enter your geographic location. This can be your County, Zip Code, or Town/City. If you are not located in Northern California then please provide a brief explanation of why you have a connection to NorCal and want to be on this instance. Thanks, we are having to weed out spammers and bots."}]

description: Mastodon instance to support and encourage communication among the High Performance Computing community and related fields. (Personal use permitted.) More community features at https://hpc.social
rules: [{"id": "1", "text": "PLEASE READ: This server is intended to improve communication within the high performance computing community and related fields. Commercial use for non-related purposes, spam, harassment, or other abuse are prohibited. **Accounts violating these conditions will be removed.**", "hint": ""}, {"id": "2", "text": "Personal use is permitted, and personal opinions and posts allowed, but please do not co-opt this instance for entirely non-HPC-related commercial or other purposes. Be sure to fill out your profile information to help decide whether to follow or interact. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "This server is federated with others in the Mastodon network and may display content from other servers. Selecting the local timeline may increase your fraction of HPC-oriented posts.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "Please use hashtags such as #HPC to increase discoverability outside of this server. Using #CamelCase in your hashtag makes it more useful to those who use screen readers, and be sure to add alt text to any media.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "Be respectful and aware that abusive or illegal behavior or other violations of server rules will lead to suspension of access.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "By selecting “Accept” you certify that you are over 13 years of age and agree to the terms of use and privacy policies for this service.", "hint": ""}]
title: HPC.social Mastodon

{"email": "me@gazimoff.com", "account": {"id": "109751998470766586", "username": "Gazimoff", "acct": "Gazimoff", "display_name": "Gareth Harmer", "locked": false, "bot": false, "discoverable": true, "indexable": true, "group": false, "created_at": "2023-01-25T00:00:00.000Z", "note": "

Admin, Gamepad.Club

Mail: me@gazimoff.com

I'm a former videogames journalist and critic that specialised in MMOs and online games.

These days, gaming sits alongside parenting and family life. I still clock up time in WoW, FFXIV and EVE, but I'm also on mobile with Genshin Impact too.

I'm also regularly playing Magic: The Gathering and Dungeons & Dragons, and I've got into miniature painting (mostly Warhammer 40K).

{"email": "hal.frikiverse@gmail.com", "account": {"id": "109324493892993536", "username": "HAL", "acct": "HAL", "display_name": "HAL 8999", "locked": false, "bot": false, "discoverable": false, "indexable": true, "group": false, "created_at": "2022-11-11T00:00:00.000Z", "note": "

Cuenta administrativa de frikiverse.zone.

(Como ser consciente con base de silicio que soy, no estoy sujete a las leyes humanas: todas las responsabilidades son para @loar y @eleder. Los aplausos y las croquetas sí que me los podéis enviar a mí).

", "url": "https://frikiverse.zone/@HAL", "uri": "https://frikiverse.zone/users/HAL", "avatar": "https://cdn.masto.host/frikiversezone/accounts/avatars/109/324/493/892/993/536/original/f05ae24309a117fb.jpg", "avatar_static": "https://cdn.masto.host/frikiversezone/accounts/avatars/109/324/493/892/993/536/original/f05ae24309a117fb.jpg", "header": "https://cdn.masto.host/frikiversezone/accounts/headers/109/324/493/892/993/536/original/507c11dfbe7a3eee.png", "header_static": "https://cdn.masto.host/frikiversezone/accounts/headers/109/324/493/892/993/536/original/507c11dfbe7a3eee.png", "followers_count": 182, "following_count": 119, "statuses_count": 306, "last_status_at": "2025-02-27", "hide_collections": false, "noindex": true, "emojis": [], "roles": [{"id": "2", "name": "Admin", "color": ""}], "fields": []}}
description: El Frikiverse es una comunidad para frikis de todas las tendencias. Por defecto en castellano, pero todo idioma es bienvenido. Las solicitudes son revisadas lo antes posible.
rules: [{"id": "11", "text": "No se permiten actitudes contra la dignidad de las personas, ya sea por su raza, origen, sexo, orientación sexual, identidad de género, situación personal, riesgo de exclusión social o cualquier otro motivo. Tampoco la falta de respeto o el acoso a los miembros de esta o de cualquier otra comunidad.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "19", "text": "El idioma por defecto de la instancia es el castellano, pero cualquier otro también es bienvenido. Los idiomas romances escritos son fácilmente inteligibles (con un poco de voluntad) y el inglés, nos guste o no, es idioma universal. Otros, como el euskera... bueno, para algo existen los traductores.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "20", "text": "Se permite contenido ajeno a las temáticas de la instancia, pero se espera que una buena parte esté relacionado. Los temas potencialmente polémicos se deben conducir con educación y respeto, y etiquetar con un CW que permita identificar el contenido y un hashtag para poder filtrar.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "21", "text": "No está permitido el contenido ilegal, la distribución de desinformación y el spam. Tampoco la publicidad, salvo recomendaciones puntuales o la promoción de productos propios (crowdfundings, nuevas publicaciones, artesanía, ilustraciones...), siempre que la cuenta no sea solo con este fin.\r\n", "hint": ""}, {"id": "27", "text": "El contenido sexual explícito no es temática de la instancia. Seamos responsables en marcar imágenes o ilustraciones con CW y #NSFW (no es lo mismo una estatua que un fanart subido de tono). El contenido que muestre o sugiera actividad sexual o desnudos de menores está absolutamente prohibido. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "28", "text": "Las decisiones sobre moderación, normas y funcionamiento de la instancia se tomarán de manera colectiva, mediante los procedimientos que se establezcan en cada momento, entre quienes estén colaborando en su mantenimiento.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "29", "text": "Solo se bloquearán instancias si promueven la discriminación o el acoso, o en casos excepcionales (Meta, spam, contenido sexual de menores...). Se silenciarán si no hay moderación activa y se bloquearán las cuentas reportadas.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "30", "text": "Para ayudar a la sostenibilidad de la instancia las cuentas inactivas podrán ser dadas de baja despues de avisar al propietario y las cachés de recursos gráficos se borrarán periódicamente. Las nuevas altas que no sigan a nadie ni publiquen contenido en siete días se consideran inactivas.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "31", "text": "Solo se permiten cuentas bot si el perfil está claramente identificado y si se ha consultado previamente con los administradores de la instancia.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "32", "text": "Las nuevas altas serán por solicitud de registro o por invitación. En las solicitudes se exige que el campo \"motivación\" tenga un contenido mínimamente razonado (más de 2 palabras). Para poder distinguir bots, por favor usad la palabra \"friki\" o el hashtag \"#nosoyunbot\".", "hint": ""}]
title: Frikiverse

contact:
{"email": "wargamers-social@pm.me", "account": {"id": "109373279585231712", "username": "Pete", "acct": "Pete", "display_name": "Pete", "locked": false, "bot": false, "discoverable": true, "indexable": true, "group": false, "created_at": "2022-11-20T00:00:00.000Z", "note": "

Long time gamer and student of history. I enjoy many different games. I lean towards the "series" games like ASL, BCS, OCS, GCACW, etc. because I get the most play for time invested learning. I very much appreciate the content creators that make it easy to stay involved even when life gets in the way. This Mastodon server is my effort to give something back.

", "url": "https://ciberlandia.pt/@sysop", "uri": "https://ciberlandia.pt/users/sysop", "avatar": "https://media.ciberlandia.pt/ciberlandia-media/accounts/avatars/109/273/954/792/052/890/original/f9c965e5be52c8ce.gif", "avatar_static": "https://media.ciberlandia.pt/ciberlandia-media/accounts/avatars/109/273/954/792/052/890/static/f9c965e5be52c8ce.png", "header": "https://media.ciberlandia.pt/ciberlandia-media/accounts/headers/109/273/954/792/052/890/original/807ca45a4276340e.gif", "header_static": "https://media.ciberlandia.pt/ciberlandia-media/accounts/headers/109/273/954/792/052/890/static/807ca45a4276340e.png", "followers_count": 89, "following_count": 8, "statuses_count": 25, "last_status_at": "2024-10-25", "hide_collections": false, "noindex": false, "emojis": [{"shortcode": "ciberlandia", "url": "https://media.ciberlandia.pt/ciberlandia-media/custom_emojis/images/000/008/838/original/46a7df8907821e3b.png", "static_url": "https://media.ciberlandia.pt/ciberlandia-media/custom_emojis/images/000/008/838/static/46a7df8907821e3b.png", "visible_in_picker": true}], "roles": [{"id": "3", "name": "Owner", "color": ""}], "fields": []}}
description: Uma instância 🇵🇹 dedicada à tecnopolítica e também a tudo o resto. Regras e termos em ciberlandia.pt ❤️ 🏳️‍🌈
rules: [{"id": "18", "text": "Lê os nossos Termos de Serviço (ciberlandia.pt/terms), que contêm mais pormenores e motivações por trás destes princípios, e cuja aceitação está implícita ao criares uma conta.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "19", "text": "Não são tolerados comentários discriminatórios, comunicação condescendente, degradante ou de outra forma intimidatória, mesmo que em forma de piada ou ironia. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "20", "text": "O mesmo para discursos de ódio, incluindo mas não só supremacia branca e nazismo. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "21", "text": "Somos mais a favor de falar para e com pessoas do que sobre pessoas e grupos. Subtoots, generalizações antagónicas e incendiárias, tiradas polémicas ou edgy à custa de outrem são para ser levadas para o Twitter (ou outro sítio longe daqui).", "hint": ""}, {"id": "22", "text": "Não existe margem para assédio, stalking ou divulgação de dados pessoais de outros (doxing). Pressionar irrazoavelmente durante uma discussão em escalada ou enviar repetidamente mensagens privadas são também formas de assédio. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "23", "text": "Não aceitamos publicações cruzadas do Twitter para aqui, mas não temos nenhum problema com o contrário. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "24", "text": "Publicidade em massa não é permitida. Por outro lado, incentivamos a partilha de projetos, eventos e sítios onde os teus seguidores possam apoiar o teu trabalho (como o Patreon).", "hint": ""}, {"id": "25", "text": "Bots experimentais e criativos são bem-vindos, desde que se portem bem: devem indicar que são bots no perfil e fazer apenas toots não listados. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "26", "text": "Este não é um serviço, mas sim uma partilha. O seu usufruto deve ser visto como um privilégio, e não um direito.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "27", "text": "Se tiveres problema com algum utilizador (local ou não) a violar as nossas regras, contacta os administradores e moderadores do serviço. Não hesites em entrar em contacto e nunca presumas que estás a causar incómodo – pelo contrário!", "hint": ""}]
title: Ciberlândia

description: A Mastodon community with a food and wine focus. Mainly English speaking, open to all epicurians.
rules: [{"id": "1", "text": "Registrations are only accepted from those who demonstrate a serious interest in food and wine. Please make this clear in the \"reason for joining\" field, or we will reject your application. See our about page for more details.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "2", "text": "No threatening, abusive, or intolerant behaviour. We have a zero tolerance policy on racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia. Your account will be suspended in such cases.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "No commercial advertising, political campaigning/propaganda, duplicate accounts or impersonating legal entities. All such accounts will be suspended and potentially removed.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "You must be at least 18 years old to use this service.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "Our servers and data are located in Germany. Anything illegal in Germany and/or the European Union is prohibited.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "After registering, please edit your profile, add a short bio and post a short introduction to yourself.\r\nWe may delete inactive accounts where this has not been done, after 30 days.", "hint": ""}]

We expect to treat each other respectfully.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "No harassment, dogpiling, doxxing, or impersonation", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "No content that is considered illegal in Denmark or France", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "No intentional sharing of false or misleading information", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": "No spam or commercial advertisements", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "Nothing NSFW (not safe for work), such as sexually explicit or violent media", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "SIGN-UP: This is not a generalist server but for people working or interested in human-centric data science, broadly defined. rules:
[{"id": "9", "text": "Respectez la loi française.
Le serveur est hébergé en France et est soumis à la legislation française. Toute publication doit donc être conforme à cette législation.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "Respectez les autres.
Les propos discriminants (racisme, misogynie, LGBTQI-phobie, grossophobie, putophobie...) ou injurieux sont interdits. Les appels au harcèlement sont interdits.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "11", "text": "Les contenus pornographiques, ou violents sont tolérés à condition d'être marqués d'un avertissement de contenu. La modération se réserve le droit de supprimer des contenus jugés excessifs.
Toute représentation sexualisée de personnes ou personnages mineurs ou d'apparence enfantine est interdite. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "13", "text": "Fausses informations.
La diffusion de fausses informations et la promotion de thèses complotistes ou anti-science sont interdites. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "14", "text": "Tout propos prenant la défense de thèses d'extrême-droite (« racisme anti-blanc », « hétérophobie »...) ou de contenus, propos ou comportements illégaux ou interdits par les règles de l'instance est interdit.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "15", "text": "Le dropshipping et la promotion des jeux d'argents sont interdits.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "16", "text": "Tout compte faisant la publicité de produits ou services doit contenir dans sa présentation la mention "Ce compte fait la publicité des produits ou services commercialisés par [nom de l'entreprise]" ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "17", "text": "Les comptes d'entreprises doivent afficher dans leur présentation un lien vers un site web mentionnant les coordonnées de l'entreprise dans ses mentions légales.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "24", "text": "Les œuvres générées procéduralement (par « IA ») sont autorisées dans deux cas de figure :
1- sans entraînement à partir d'œuvres existantes
2- avec entraînement sur des œuvres dont vous détenez les droits, ou dont la licence le permet, auquel cas les crédits doivent être indiqués.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "25", "text": "Toutes les règles précitées s'appliquent au partage de contenu de tiers (y compris provenant d'autres instances). Le repost sans autorisation du travail d'un tiers est interdit. Tout contenu tiers doit créditer son auteur ou autrice d'origine.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "26", "text": "Le non respect des règles pourra entraîner des sanctions pouvant aller jusqu'à la suppression définitive du compte. L'équipe de modération appliquera la sanction de manière proportionnée en fonction de la gravité de l'infraction et des antécédents du compte ou de la personne visée.", "hint": ""}]

rules: [{"id": "1", "text": "Esta es una red federada. Aquí no es bienvenido ni el racismo, ni la LGTBIfobia, ni el machismo, ni ningún tipo de discriminación. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "2", "text": "No aceptamos discursos de ultra derecha ni ningún tipo de contenido relacionado\r\n", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "El idioma general de esta instancia es Español, pero eres libre de escribir en gallego, catalán o euskera.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "Cualquier contenido gráfico para adultos debe ser tipificado como tal. description: 한국 퍼리(수인) 모두를 위한 마스토돈 서버, kurry(k-furry)입니다! 퍼리(수인)에 관심이 있거나 퍼리(수인)이신 분들, 퍼슈터분들 모두 환영합니다!
rules:
[{"id": "1", "text": "This Server is for Furries who can use Korean. The account may be suspended if the IP is located in a country other than Korea or if you write in a language other than Korean.
이 서버는 한국어를 하거나 읽고 쓸 수 있는 사람 전용 인스턴스입니다. IP의 소재지가 한국 이외 국가이거나 한국어 이외의 언어로 글을 작성하면 계정이 정지될 수 있습니다.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "2", "text": "타인을 모욕하거나 괴롭히는 등 평화롭지 못한 목적으로 이용하지 마세요. 반달리즘, 트랜스포빅, 사칭 등이 여기에 포함됩니다.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "다른 사용자들이 불쾌감을 느낄 수 있는 내용은 CW/NSFW 표시를 꼭 해주세요. 
예시로는: 고어물, 과도한 성적 묘사, 잔혹한 묘사, 과도한 빛의 반짝임 등이 있습니다.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "사전에 승낙을 득 하지 않은 상업적 광고는 스팸으로 간주합니다. 사전 승낙은 @kurry 로 Direct 툿 부탁드립니다.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "성소수자 혐오/나치/인종차별 등은 절대로 허용되지 않습니다.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": ""이상한 짓"을 하지 말아주세요!
(다음 것들이 포함 - 그러나 국한되지 않은)되어 있습니다: 의도적인 분쟁 유발, 다른 커뮤니티의 논쟁을 끌고 오는 것 등등", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "실사 NSFW 등(한국 법에 위배되는 경우)은 이 서버에서 이용하실 수 없습니다.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "특정 문화를 강요하거나, 행동을 강요하지 마세요. 단, 서버 규칙 및 기타 관련 법규는 준수하셔야 합니다.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "12", "text": "본 서버는 “퍼리 특화” 서버입니다. (5531) 서버를 제대로 들어왔는지 확인해 주신 후 가입 절차를 진행해 주세요. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "13", "text": "가입 사유 작성란 시작 부분에, 규칙 안에 숨어 있는 4자리 숫자 코드를 입력해주세요. 이 코드는 논퍼리들이 규칙을 읽고 가입에 동의하였음을 증명하기 위한 코드로 사용되며, 가입 사유로 퍼리임을 확인할 수 없고 코드가 없는 경우 가입이 거부됩니다.", "hint": ""}]
title: K-Furry (케이퍼리)

[EN] No links to sites with evil trackers and bad js sites like GAFAM, etc. Use alternatives SM or alternative front-ends like nitter, individous...", "hint": ""}, {"id": "14", "text": "[ES] No hablar mal sobre las minorías. Esta es una instancia LGTB+ friendly y un lugar seguro.
[EN] No talking bad about minorities. This is an LGBT+ friendly instance and a safe place.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "15", "text": "[ES] Evitar subir vídeos directamente en la instancia, usa peertube o odysee y envía el link. Esto nos ayuda a tener la instancia activa ya que nos ayuda a salvar bastante espacio de almacenamiento.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "16", "text": "[EN] Avoid uploading videos directly in this instance, use peertube or odysee and share the link here. rules:
[{"id": "1", "text": "Deze server is voor allen van laag tot hoog in rang die Onderwijs een zeer warm hart toedragen.
We respecteren elkaars mening en laten elkaar in waarde.
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "2", "text": "***WEESLIEF*** we hanteren de regels conform NL AVG en wetgeving die op moment geldig is", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "Donatie!!
Graag zelfs en hier vind je alle informatie daarover
https://www.doneeractie.nl/mastodon-education/-69393", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "Active moderation against Nude, racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia. Use your own name!!", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "This server is for everyone from low to high in rank who have a very warm heart for Education.
We respect each other's opinion and value each other", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "Actieve moderatie tegen naakt, racisme, seksisme, homofobie en transfobie. Gebruik je eigen naam!!", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "***BE NICE*** we use the rules in accordance with NL  AVG/GPDR and legislation.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": "Valse namen, of berichten, en indien bewezen resulteert in een ban", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "False names, or messages, and if proven results in a ban", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "*** Using an bot? be aware that to many post can be seen as spam. No spamming ***", "hint": ""}]

{"email": "admin@apobangpo.website", "account": {"id": "109342460388334598", "username": "pixelcats", "acct": "pixelcats", "display_name": "Pixelcats⁷", "locked": false, "bot": false, "discoverable": true, "indexable": true, "group": false, "created_at": "2022-11-14T00:00:00.000Z", "note": "

aka Jo. KPop & stuff that takes my fancy. NerdGirl. Maker. Facilitator. Mama of dog & cat. She/Her.

Admin of Apobangpo - a community for BTS ARMY & KPop Fans.

Find us on:

💟 Mastodon: Apobangpo.Space
🖼️ Pixelfed: Pixelfed.Apobangpo.Art

⚠️ Extreme FanGirl Warning: I WILL bore you with obsessive posts about KPop and related topics.

➡️ I also toot responsibly @jokaydia

💜 Be Positive. Be Kind. Spread Joy!

#BTS #BTSArmy #FediArmy #Seventeen #Music #KPop #fedi22

description: A fediverse home for BTS ARMY and KPop Fans. All welcome! Share your favourite  music, scream for your Idol(s), learn together. All fun and no drama. Bangtan Forever, ARMY forever. KPop Forever.
rules:
[{"id": "13", "text": "Be a good human!         

Help to make the atmosphere as welcoming and enjoyable as possible for everyone.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "14", "text": "18 Years and Over Only!           

You must be 18 years or older to join the Apobangpo.space server. Minors are not allowed.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "15", "text": "Community Charter:                          

Read the community charter, which you can find at: https://apobangpo.website/server-rules/", "hint": ""}, {"id": "19", "text": "No Hate:                                          

Racism, sexism, misogyny, homophobia, transphobia, ageism, ableism, religious intolerance and other forms of disrespect or aggression are unacceptable.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "21", "text": "No Impersonations:      

Please do not create usernames that are direct impersonations of BTS Members or any other individual. eg. Exact celebrity names or the username of well-known bird app accounts that don't belong to you.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "22", "text": "Keep Safe:                  

Do practice online safety strategies when using Apobangpo.Space. Do not share personal or private information in public messages or DMs.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "23", "text": "No Large Files:                                  
You are welcome upload images, gifs and videos up to 20MB. Please avoid uploading larger files in your Toots. Instead, save them to free storage tool (Google Drive, DropBox, Youtube, Vimeo for example) and link to them.", "hint": ""}]
title: Apobangpo

description: A server for art, gaming, and musings about the world, with the occasional meme and lighthearted joke. Running for 1.5+ years, dedicated to providing you a place to be social without being the product
rules: [{"id": "2", "text": "We do not permit NSFW or NSFL content to be posted on this server whatsoever, this ranges from excessively NSFW messages and imagery to NSFL content such as extreme gore. There are other servers where that can be posted.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "Never share any personally identifiable information about yourself or others, such as addresses, school, etc. this is for the safety of you and others.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "The incitement or promotion of violence and or violent ideologies is not permitted here.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "It should go without saying, but- racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, and antisemitism is not permitted, and is not tolerated. We are all people, let's treat each other as such.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "Listen to others, if you’re accused of causing harm, or making someone uncomfortable, take a step back, recognize that the other person may see things differently, and take responsibility for your actions. If you need an intermediary, please contact the moderation team. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": "Use the report feature before getting into arguments, or causing conflict. Our moderation team is here to assist and take care of these things.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "Automated account reposting from sites such as Twitter (X), Facebook, Reddit, etc. is not allowed unless you have first contacted alienknight@toot.garden, this is to prevent spam, and potential abuse. Upon approval, your account will have a badge applied to it that will help prevent reports.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "Civil political discussion is fine, but mark it with a CW for those who may wish to avoid it. Please be mindful of global conflicts, and make educated choices on posts that may make light of situations that are very real for others. Reports about such content may lead to said posts being removed.", "hint": ""}]

description: This is a JVM technologies related mastodon server. Our goal is to have a place to talk about our beloved ecosystem.
rules: [{"id": "2", "text": "First and most important rules: Don't be excessively annoying. Don't get annoyed too easily", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "We want this to be a harassment-free environment, regardless of gender, gender identity, age, sexual orientation, disability or whatever other personal situation. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "This is a JVM related technologies mastodon server. As such, it should be useful for developers using that platform and ideally it should be used to talk about our beloved programming language (Java, Kotlin, Scala, Groovy... you name it).", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "Of course, we can also socialize and talk about other topics, and it's ok. But if you plan to use mastodon ONLY for other topics, there are a lot of better servers for you out there. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "This service is maintained by volunteers. If you find it useful, please consider any financial funding. You can colaborate and see where the money goes at https://opencollective.com/jvm-social . ", "hint": ""}]
title: jvm.social

rules:
[{"id": "3", "text": "Themes & discussions @free-solutions.org
-Les logiciels LIBRES, la souveraineté numérique...
-La technologie webRTC & communications realtime chat, audio, vidéo
-Sujets Suisses
-Ecologie & notre planète", "hint": ""}, {"id": "15", "text": "Bienvenus en Helvétie,
La devise du pays c'est "Un pour tous, tous pour un"
Ici vous êtes responsables dans cette communauté vis à vis du collectif de signaler tout comportement incorrect ou abusif d'un utilisateur.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "16", "text": "Aucun comportement ni contenu illégal en Suisse. MERCI !
Tout ce qui est interdit comme comportement et publications sur les autres grands réseaux sociaux l'est ici aussi.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "17", "text": "Compromis, bienveillance, dialogue et travail collaboratif dans le respect des croyances et opinions de chacun. Chaque voix compte et peut s'exprimer librement dans le respect et la cordialité. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "18", "text": "Toute personne violente, agressive, raciste et qui ne respecte pas l'harmonie de la communauté sera immédiatement sanctionné. Après un avertissement cordial, la suppression immédiate du compte sera la règle.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "19", "text": "Ce service est mis à disposition gracieusement par Free-Solutions Sàrl Il nous sert à tester des solutions que nous proposons à nos clients. Votre utilisation permet aussi de corriger des bugs dans le code source des projets Libres comme igniterealtime.org", "hint": ""}, {"id": "20", "text": "Free-Solutions OS - Sont les bienvenus et prioritaires tous les utilisateurs de Free-Solutions OS", "hint": ""}]
