description: Veracious Network hosted in central Ohio, US is comprised of folks interested in gaming, technology, science, and open source. 18+ content allowed (only with content warning included)
rules: [{"id": "1", "text": "No Racism or Hate Speech"}, {"id": "2", "text": "Political discussion and debate is fine, arguing like children is fine if you really want, but keep it mostly civil and do not attack someone personally."}, {"id": "3", "text": "Interacting with the community is highly recommended, but lurkers are welcome too if that's your thing."}, {"id": "4", "text": "If you encounter issues with any of our server's and or members. Please let an admin or moderator know! "}, {"id": "11", "text": "Treat others how you would like to be treated"}, {"id": "12", "text": "Do not advertise without permission and absolutely no link building campaign accounts.  Accounts for knock-off imitation products, gambling, and cock fighting will be promptly blocked."}, {"id": "13", "text": "Do not link scam websites"}, {"id": "14", "text": "Staff and moderators decisions are authoritative and final, but we're still humans; feel free to open a dialogue to ask about our decisions."}, {"id": "16", "text": "Community members are free to express themselves openly and give constructive criticism and feedback"}, {"id": "19", "text": "No exposed genitalia (penis, vagina) in your profile image or profile banner.  Full nudity is allowed within posts when a Content Warning (NSFW/nudity/etc) is applied to inform folks of the content."}, {"id": "20", "text": "Valid and reachable email is required, no temporary email accounts, sorry.  We don't sell your emails or sign you up for bullshit, but we _do_ need to be able to reach you should there be an issue with your account."}, {"id": "21", "text": "No selling drugs, (legal or illegal), on the platform."}, {"id": "22", "text": "Due to an ongoing attack against the network, we have temporally changed registrations to require moderator approval."}]
title: Veracious Network

description:
Welcome to this open and positive server located in Sweden. Our main rule is: Choose to be kind.

Registrations are open for anyone, but please post in Swedish or English.
rules: [{"id": "1", "text": "No \"hate speech\", speech that expresses a form of prejudice or threatens people of protected characteristics (such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, pregnancy, religion, sex or sexuality)."}, {"id": "2", "text": "No Calls to violence. Any individual promoting violence towards any person or group. "}, {"id": "3", "text": "No harassment. If a user explicitly asks you to disengage, you should. "}, {"id": "4", "text": "Nudity involving the genitals, sexual acts, or pornography is not allowed. "}, {"id": "5", "text": "No content illegal in Sweden. The server is here, we will abide by Swedish law. "}, {"id": "6", "text": "All bots must respect the #nobot tag and must post unlisted. "}, {"id": "7", "text": "Posts intended for commercial advertisement purposes must be posted with the #ad tag or unlisted. "}, {"id": "8", "text": "Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services."}, {"id": "9", "text": "You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts. Especially if you’re funny."}, {"id": "10", "text": "No attacks against (or from) the instance. You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of this server, the users of the service or their data"}, {"id": "12", "text": "User accounts whose only activity consisted of registration, but did not post anything or follow anybody or interact with the fediverse in any other way might be deleted after a short period of time. This is in order to prevent bot activity."}]
title: Toots.nu

rules: [{"id": "1", "text": "No Bigotry or Discrimination", "hint": "No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, any other forms of discriminatory and bigoted conduct."}, {"id": "2", "text": "No Violence", "hint": "No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies"}, {"id": "3", "text": "No Harassment, brigading or doxxing of other users", "hint": "Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, doxx other users, or to incite other users to do so is strictly prohibited."}, {"id": "4", "text": "No Misinformation or Disinformation", "hint": "Do not share intentionally false or misleading information"}, {"id": "6", "text": "Content Warnings for Explicit Content", "hint": "Any nudity, sexually explicit or violent content, including artistic depictions, must be marked as sensitive with a clear content warning when posting"}, {"id": "7", "text": "No Cryptocurrency", "hint": "No advertising, promoting, or advocating for cryptocurrencies, NFTs, or other blockchain related products."}, {"id": "9", "text": "No Spam", "hint": "No unsolicited commercial promotions, affiliate links, signup links, other types of advertisements. Self promotion is permitted for independent creators, as long as it's not deemed excessive (when in doubt please ask)."}, {"id": "11", "text": "All Accounts are Manually Reviewed", "hint": "When signing up, please tell us what interests you about Raphus Social, and why you would like to join our community. Generic or vague responses will be rejected."}]
title: Raphus Social

{"email": "admin@frontrange.co", "account": {"id": "109294897323248026", "username": "raineer", "acct": "raineer", "display_name": "Michael Miller :blobrdm: 🦆", "locked": false, "bot": false, "discoverable": true, "indexable": true, "group": false, "created_at": "2022-11-06T00:00:00.000Z", "note": "

Kindness above all things!!

Been here since 2018 but started a new instance to welcome all our new friends...

 Boulder, Colorado - Operator of frontrange.co 

Computers are things which need to do what I mean and not what I say.

Black Lives Matter
Trans rights are human rights.

General purpose nerd:
Physics, Linux (Arch btw), Fountain Pens, Weather, Formula 1

Somehow I've worked in printing for three decades - can't wait to see what I do when I grow up

rules:
[{"id": "1", "text": "Halte alle Gesetze und Regeln ein, die du auch im realen Leben mit deinem Gegenüber einhälst.
"}, {"id": "2", "text": "Erwünscht
- Ermutigung von Mitmenschen hier in der Gruppe
- Bibelzitate, die uns Stärken und Kraft geben"}, {"id": "4", "text": "Was wir wollen
Die Liebe zur Bibel und zu dem Gott der Liebe stärken."}, {"id": "5", "text": "Wer ist willkommen
Jeder, der den Gott der Bibel kennenlernen möchte, oder schon kennt. Hauptsache ist, dass du IHN und Sein Wort respektierst."}, {"id": "6", "text": "Unser Gott ist ein Gott der Ordnung und deshalb sollte es auch hier geordnet zugehen. Bei Fragen kann gerne ein Admin / Moderator kontaktiert werden,letztendlich obliegt es aber diesen zu entscheiden, ob etwas erbaulich für die Gruppe ist oder nicht."}, {"id": "7", "text": "Wir Menschen machen alle Fehler und Konflikte sollten bitte nicht in der Gruppe ausgetragen werden. "}, {"id": "8", "text": "Gottes Wort ist uns heilig - wer sich über die Bibel oder über Jehovah lustig machen möchte, ist bei uns falsch und darf sich eine andere Instanz suchen."}, {"id": "9", "text": "Nicht erwünscht - Keine Propaganda - Keine Werbung oder massives Spamming von Nachrichten - Keine unnötigen Diskussionen über Lehr und Dogmatik"}]
title: Elizur -  "mein Gott ist ein Fels"

rules:
[{"id": "11", "text": "Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "12", "text": "Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "13", "text": "Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "14", "text": "Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "15", "text": "Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as is any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "16", "text": "Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the clj.social community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "17", "text": "Do not “shitpost” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for “shitposting” on clj.social.
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "18", "text": "Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "19", "text": "Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "20", "text": "Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on clj.social, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "21", "text": "Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email team@clj.social.", "hint": ""}]
title: clj.social

description:
This server is aimed at Gaelic speakers.
Tha am frithealaiche seo ann do luchd na Gàidhlig.
Ma tha duilgheadas agad leis a’ CAPTCHA, cuir post-d thugainn air rianaire@co-shaoghal.net
rules: [{"id": "2", "text": "Bi caoimhneil", "hint": "Nuair a bios fearg ort, fuirich greis is gabh cupan tì mus sgrìobh thu rud a bhiodh tu duilich mu dhèidhinn an uairsin."}, {"id": "3", "text": "Na bi ri gràin", "hint": "Na bi ri cainnt-ghràin, gràin-chinnidh, oillt thar-ghnèitheach no gràin sam bith eile. Tha oillt thar-ghnèitheach a’ gabhail a-staigh brosnachadh “teiripe iompachaidh” agus cleachdadh na seann-ghnè (“mì-ghnèitheachadh”) no an t-seann-ainm (“marbh-ainmeachadh”) a dh‘aona-ghnothach."}, {"id": "4", "text": "Na postaich nithean mì-laghail", "hint": "Na postaich dad a tha mì-laghail 'nad dhùthaich fhèin (ach ma chuireas an lagh do bhith fo cunnart) no sa Ghearmailt (far a bheil am frithealaiche seo)."}, {"id": "5", "text": "Tha postadh lomnochd cuingichte air an fhrithealaiche seo", "hint": "Tha lomnochd ceadaichte ma chuireas tu air cùlaibh rabhadh susbainte i is comharra gu bheil na meadhanan frionasach. Gidheadh, chan eil sinn ag iarraidh pòrnografachd."}, {"id": "6", "text": "Na sgaoil mì-fhios", "hint": "Na sgaoil mì-fhios mu chùisean slàinte no poileataigeach. Gu h-àraidh, ma chì thu beachd a b’ fìor-thoil leat creidsinn, feuch gun dearbh thu gu bheil e fìor le beagan rannsachaidh mus brosnaich thu e."}, {"id": "7", "text": "Na sàraich càch", "hint": "Tha seo a’ gabhail a-staigh spama, oilbheum a dh’aona-ghnothach, maoidheadh is innse bhreugan mu chàch.\r\nNa cleachd tòrr thagaichean hais ann am postaichean nach buinn ri cuspair an taga."}, {"id": "8", "text": "Na foillsich fiosrachadh prìobhaideach mu chàch", "hint": "Tha seo a’ gabhail a-staigh an ainm, seòladh, àireamh fòn ⁊ msaa."}]
title: An t-Ailbhean

rules:
[{"id": "2", "text": "Do:
Using welcoming and inclusive language.
Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences.
Gracefully accepting constructive criticism.
Focusing on what is best for the community.
Showing empathy towards other community members.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "Do not post:
Sexualised language/imagery/unwelcome sexual attention or advances.
Personal/political attacks inclusive of racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia.
Publishing others’ private information.
Publish any illegal content in the UK.
Incitement of violence/violent ideologies", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "Commercial:
Company accounts are welcome but advertising is not permitted on this server. Over promotion, bot like behaviour replying to users, etc. will not be tolerated.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "Public interest accounts:
Use of accounts for public figures is encouraged however, we ask you interact with comments and the community and not use your account as a notice board or press release hub by ignoring comments/interactions with other users.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "** You must **
Have a link to the IoW (UK) and state how in the signup process.
Requests with no link stated in the "Why do you want to join" will be rejected.", "hint": ""}]
title: IOW.Social

description: Silversword is a general English-speaking instance for gamers. No matter if you are a Steam gamer, Xbox, PlayStation, Nintendo, Amiga, Atari... You get the point :-) Hop on and let's talk video games!
rules: [{"id": "4", "text": "Read the message below these rules carefully. It is important for the future of your account on this server!", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "This is a gaming-oriented Mastodon instance. It is created by a gamer for gamers. Post anything related to video games. PC gaming, console gaming, VR gaming, mobile gaming. All other topics of your interest are absolutely allowed (see the next rule) but the main topic here is video games.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "Real-life politics is not allowed. We are gathered on this instance to provide an escape from reality called video games. We love games, we live games. We welcome you into this community with any topic of your interest (besides gaming) except real-life politics.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "Before you join this instance, take a moment to think about what these four words mean to you: Peace, Love, Unity, and Respect. It is the intention of this instance to be welcoming of other Human beings no matter their color or identity. As gamers, we set the example.", "hint": ""}]

Aanzetten tot haat wordt gedefinieerd als denigrerende berichten of links gericht op een individu of groep op basis van ras, mentale of fysieke handicap, religie, genderidentiteit, geslacht, nationaliteit, leeftijd, klasse of seksuele geaardheid.
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "19", "text": "Geen "shitposting" - terwijl humoristische posts zijn toegestaan, en eigenlijk wordt aangemoedigd, maar er is hier geen plaats voor "shitposting".
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "20", "text": ""bots" onder voorbehoud. Geautomatiseerde accounts die overwegend (door)posten van een andere bron zijn alleen in overleg toegestaan.", "hint": ""}]

rules: [{"id": "1", "text": "IMPORTANTE: Las cuentas que no cumplan mayoritariamente con la temática de la instancia podrían ser y serán suspendidas. Si no vas a cumplir la temática y normas de la instancia, NO te registres aquí.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "2", "text": "No se permite la violencia contra otras personas ni las amenazas o acoso por motivo de su raza, origen étnico, nacionalidad, orientación sexual, género, identidad de género, afiliación religiosa, edad, discapacidad, enfermedad grave o cualquier otra situación personal.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "Se bloqueará a toda cuenta o dominio que implícita o explícitamente difunda propaganda terrorista, franquista, nazi o promuevan otras formas de violencia, sin importar el tipo. Asimismo, se prohíbe cualquier acto contrario a las leyes del Estado Español o Suiza, lugar donde está alojado el servidor.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "No se permite la participación en situaciones de acoso dirigidas a una persona o la incitación a otras personas a hacerlo. Esto incluye desear o esperar que alguien sufra daños físicos o psicológicos. No puedes fomentar ni promover el suicidio o las autolesiones.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "No está permitido publicar cualquier tipo de información privada de otras personas (como el número de teléfono y la dirección de su casa) sin su autorización y permiso. También prohibimos amenazar con divulgar información privada o incentivar a otros a hacerlo.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "No está permitido publicar ni compartir fotos o videos, tanto íntimos como no, de otra persona que se hayan producido o distribuido sin el consentimiento de ella. Asimismo, no está permitido publicar información privada sin consentimiento.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "No está permitido impersonar o usurpar la identidad de personas, grupos u organizaciones para inducir a error, confundir o engañar a otros usuarios, así como tampoco utilizar una identidad falsa para engañar a otras personas.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": "Está prohibido compartir, con la intención de engañar, contenido multimedia falso o alterado que pueda dar lugar a daños graves.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "Está totalmente prohibida la publicación de cualquier contenido para adultos (desnudos, pornografía, violencia o gore) sin su respectiva etiqueta CW. La administración se reserva el derecho de eliminar contenido de este tipo en cualquier caso.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "11", "text": "Debes usar los CW (Content Warning/Trigger Warning/Advertencia de contenido) siempre que sean necesarios de forma correcta.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "12", "text": "Está prohibido el contenido ilegal. Cada usuaria es dueña de sus comentarios y el contenido que publica y comparte. Esta instancia de Mastodon, no se responsabiliza del contenido publicado por las personas usuarias.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "13", "text": "No se permite el crossposting generalizado. Nos gustaría tener interacción entre todas las cuentas. No hagas de tu cuenta un fantasma. Esto solo se permitirá en las cuentas espejo oficialmente autorizadas por la administración.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "15", "text": "Por favor, establece una politica de borrado de toots antiguos razonable. Recuerda que esto es una instancia compartida entre todas las personas que la formamos. No disponemos de recursos ilimitados. Haz un uso responsable.", "hint": ""}]

rules:
[{"id": "1", "text": "No hate speech. We have a zero-tolerance policy on hate speech. 
This includes slurs or any form of degrading, dehumanizing, or derisive speech based on characteristics such as race, heritage, disability, age, sex, sexual preference, gender, socio-economic status, or religion.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "2", "text": "No harassment or doxing. 
Treat any other users' known personally identifying information with respect. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "No content which is illegal in the countries of Canada or the United States of America. 
We are hosted on a US server and serve content to users in Canada. Content which violates law in either of these nations will be removed and offending users/instances will be limited or banned.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "Mastodon servers which break our rules will be banned from federating with nfld.me. 
It is possible to follow users on servers all around the world. The Federated Timeline also streams posts from other servers. Those which break our rules will be limited or blocked from communicating with us. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "Don' go postin' tings ya wouldn' want yer mudder ta see. 
In other words, be considerate of others when posting. Remember that your neighbours, family, and friends are here. Let's maintain a good sense of community. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "No spam. Excessive advertising or mass-marketing posts will be limited accordingly. Local business endorsement is allowed in moderation. This is not a marketplace, however. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "No impersonation of other individuals or entities. Those found to be representing themselves as another person or entity will be dealt with accordingly. Clearly indicate whether your account is a parody account. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": "No pornography, gore, or obscenity. This is not the place to share that content. Please provide a content warning (CW button in post box) for material depicting non-pornographic nudity, violence, unsafe actions, and/or potentially disturbing media.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "Do not attack or abuse the host, and please report any found vulnerabilities or bugs to the instance admin. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "Please direct requests for site features to the Mastodon open-source project. While we may implement downstream changes specific to our instance as we see fit, we wish to maintain relative parity with the latest stable Mastodon release. ", "hint": ""}, {"id": "11", "text": "Nobody under the age of 13 is permitted to use nfld.me. If you know your child aged 13 to 17 is using this service, please ensure they know how to use online social spaces safely.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "12", "text": "No intentionally false or misleading information. Please ensure any news you post is factual and from a reputable source. Intentionally reported misinformation (disinformation) will not be tolerated.", "hint": ""}]
title: Mastodon Newfoundland and Labrador

description: We are building network of neurodiverse individuals and giving a them a safe and inclusive area. You don’t have to be from Australia to join, and you don’t have to be neurodivergent. All are welcome.
rules: [{"id": "1", "text": "No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies."}, {"id": "2", "text": "Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behavior will be removed. We have a zero tolerance approach to racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia."}, {"id": "3", "text": "The Content Warning (\"CW\") flag should be used for anything that, again, you wouldn't feel comfortable showing to your grandmother. This includes NSFW content, gore, and other similar items."}, {"id": "4", "text": "Account registrations are monitored. Even though account signups are open, your account may be suspended if a human considers it potentially fake or bot."}, {"id": "5", "text": "Always be kind to each other. Don't say anything you wouldn't face to face."}, {"id": "6", "text": "This server is actively moderated. You will probably not be advised of the outcome of a complaint that you made, but rest assure it will be investigated."}, {"id": "7", "text": "Moderation and administration decisions are Final."}, {"id": "8", "text": "This server is in NSW, and all your data will remain in Australia. We are firm believers in data sovereignty. "}, {"id": "9", "text": "No bots without explicit permission from the server admin team"}, {"id": "10", "text": "Obey Australian law and international treaties."}, {"id": "11", "text": "The goal of these rules is to ensure that this remain a safe, non-judmental space where it is ok to unmask."}, {"id": "13", "text": "No commercial accounts without admin approval\r\n\r\nNeurodiversity-in.au is provided without any payment required to ensure it is available for the most vulnerable in our community. "}]
title: Neurodiversity In Australia

description: Ceilidh.Online is meant to be a safe gathering place for like-minded people who want to participate in the #Fediverse.
rules:
[{"id": "2", "text": "Do not engage in hate speech of any kind
Any post that contains hateful language meant to demean or harm another user or group of people will not be tolerated and your account and IP will be banned for doing so.  We are not a government so don't even try to claim First Amendment rights.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "3", "text": "Use CW at your discretion to help protect the community at large
It is expected that you can self-edit and place sensitive posts behind a CW. Warnings will be given for non-compliance and further action will be taken if the issue persists.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "4", "text": "Please report issues to the Admins and Moderators and let us take care of them
Please do not act as an admin or moderator if you are not.  Instead, report adverse activity so the team can handle it properly as well as make reports to other admins.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "5", "text": "Violence against any member of this or other instances will result in your account being banned
If this is not clear enough for you then maybe this isn't the instance for you.  Violent and threatening speach will not be tolerated against anyone on the Fediverse and will result in an immediate ban.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "6", "text": "Talk, Share, Intermingle, and Have Fun!
This server is meant to be a place where we can have all sorts of discussions and share our moments.  Please keep that in mind when you post.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "7", "text": "Please submit missing language translations to mods and admins
This system is translation-enabled using libretranslate.  If you are unable to translate a post please share that post with a mod or admin so we can add the language pack to the system.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "8", "text": "We Are a Safe Place for the LGBTQIA+ Community
You are safe here.  The admin and mod team are hand-picked to be sensitive to our community and we will do everything we can to make sure you will be comfortable here.  Anyone that is not part of the LGBTQIA+ community or an ally need not apply.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "9", "text": "No Discrimination Allowed, EVER!
We welcome all races, ethnicities, genders, etc. as long as you follow the rules.  We are stronger through diversity and through diversity we understand our selves better.
", "hint": ""}, {"id": "10", "text": "This Instance Honors Reports from Fediblock
Instances reported to the Fediblock hashtag are reviewed throughout the day and added to our filters to help ensure the content here is not pluted by hatred and bigotry.", "hint": ""}, {"id": "11", "text": "New Account Requests Must Have a Meaningful Reason
When requesting a new account you must include a meaningful reason for joining this server.  Requests that only have a word or two in the reason, or the reason does not make sense will be rejected.", "hint": ""}]
title: Ceilidh Online

rules: [{"id": "2", "text": "This server is intended to be a place for Dartisans like  myself to chat together and explore the fediverse as seen from the Dart community, however a few ground rules have to apply to users, not that I'm expecting any users to break these but please see below."}, {"id": "3", "text": "No privacy violations against other people; doxing, revealing or sexual images of someone else, information about someone's health, or crimes done against them."}, {"id": "4", "text": "No threats against other people."}, {"id": "5", "text": "No xenophobia, hate speech or incitement to such things."}, {"id": "6", "text": "No incitements to break any of the server rules"}, {"id": "7", "text": "No spread of violent images, sexual violence, torture, or forced actions."}]
